instructions: Image titled Make Your Yelp Bookmarks Public from the Yelp for iPhone App Step 1 1 Download, install and open the Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore (if you haven't done so already). Image titled Make Your Yelp Bookmarks Public from the Yelp for iPhone App Step 2 2 Login to your Yelp account, if you haven't already done so. Image titled Make Your Yelp Bookmarks Public from the Yelp for iPhone App Step 3 3 Visit your Settings. Tap the "More" button from the bottom right corner of the screen. Scroll the list all the way to the bottom.Tap the "Settings" option. Image titled Make Your Yelp Bookmarks Public from the Yelp for iPhone App Step 4 4 Tap the "Privacy Settings" option Image titled Make Your Yelp Bookmarks Public from the Yelp for iPhone App Step 5 5 Tap the listing that says "Public" underneath the "Bookmarks" section of the screen. Image titled Make Your Yelp Bookmarks Public from the Yelp for iPhone App Step 6 6 Save the new setting by tapping the "Back" button from the top left corner of the screen. Advertisement
